data.title: Empower Guatemala: Donate to Transform Lives
data.meta_description: Support impactful ministries in Guatemala with Global Faith Network. Your donation empowers local leaders for positive change. Join us today!
data.text: Global Faith Network is a Christ-centered organization that works with and alongside leaders in Guatemala. Our goal is to offer support for their ministries. Empowering local leaders allows them to focus on the work they are doing to improve the lives of the many people they serve.
